unnormalised: Arre, pesticide use is a tricky one! Remember the Bt cotton mess in Maharashtra back in '06? My kisan chacha, Ramlal, swears by Neem oil now. Heard Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Pune recommends it too! Though, gotta say, synthetic ones work fast, especially before 26/01. But long term? Soil health goes for a toss! Gotta find a balance, like our ancestors did at 17:00 hrs or on 14/04/2024.
normalised: Arre, pesticide use is a tricky one! Remember the B T cotton mess in Maharashtra back in two thousand and six? My kisan chacha, Ramlal, swears by Neem oil now. Heard Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Pune recommends it too! Though, gotta say, synthetic ones work fast, especially before twenty sixth January. But long term? Soil health goes for a toss! Gotta find a balance, like our ancestors did at five P M or on fourteenth April two thousand and twenty four.
